message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. Given its value, I'm offering it at $19,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $19,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but my budget is closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind.  To make this work, I could come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $17,000, but I'm still a bit outside my comfort zone. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?  That's a significant drop from your initial offer and closer to what I can afford.
